DOC.HEADLINE: HAUER , RICHARDSON TO STAR IN ' FATHERLAND '
DOC.TEXT: Rutger Hauer and Miranda Richardson have been signed to star in " Fatherland , " a TV movie for HBO based on the novel by Robert Harris , which looks_at what the Third_Reich might have been like had Germany won World_War_II . Hauer plays a German detective and Richardson portrays an American journalist ; together they team_up to expose secrets about Adolf Hitler ' s regime . The production will be filmed in Berlin and Prague .
